ModMetaData.name: Psionic Bomb
ModMetaData.author: HopeSeekr
ModMetaData.description:
Version 1 The Better Rimworlds Psionic Bomb is a premier defense weapon against all humanoid raiders and other undesireables.
However, if not protected with a Psionic Bomb Helmet, your colonists and animals will be affected, too.
**ALERT: The Psionic Bomb has *harsh* consequences for all higher lifeforms on the map!**
